name: Indycar Challenge
overview: The game is made up of two distinct parts, the first is a pseudo managerial section where the player must manage their finances effectively, upgrade their car's capabilities as and when they see fit. The second part of the game is the racing, where a season consists of 16 races. Manage Team Setup, change engines, aerodynamics, tires, even chassis for best track performance. Hire and train your pit crew to speed in game services. Manage finances and check championship points. Borrow and repay the vast loans needed to keep your car in the best kit. Now enjoy the race, over 12 laps you must do your best using the mechanics available and your reflexes and preparation.
